identity.name: SmartSpend AI
principles: Fusion: Utility meets Organic. Receipts are boring; make them feel like achievements.
Emotion: Green isn't just money; it's growth. Use organic emeralds, not corporate dollars.
Clarity: Financial data must be instant. No cognitive load.
Tactility: Uploading a bill should feel like feeding a machine. Use sound and physics.

heading.usage: Page titles, major stats, brand moments

mono.usage: Prices, receipt items, transaction IDs, code snippets

primary.description: Emerald 600 - The color of savings and growth.

accent.description: Orange 500 - For offers, alerts, and 'Hot Deals'.

surface.description: Pure white for cards to pop against Stone 50.

grid_system.dashboard: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-6 p-6 md:p-8
grid_system.marketing: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-8 md:gap-12 px-6 md:px-12

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl hover:-translate-y-0.5 transition-all duration-300 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-bold tracking-wide
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-stone-200 text-stone-700 hover:bg-stone-50 hover:border-stone-300 transition-all rounded-full px-6 py-3 font-medium
buttons.ghost: text-stone-500 hover:text-emerald-600 hover:bg-emerald-50/50 rounded-lg px-4 py-2

cards.base: bg-white border border-stone-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300 rounded-2xl overflow-hidden

inputs.base: bg-stone-50 border-stone-200 focus:border-emerald-500 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-emerald-100 rounded-xl px-4 py-3 transition-all

visual_enhancers.receipt_edge: Use a 'jagged' CSS mask or SVG border for receipt containers.
visual_enhancers.scan_line: Animated gradient line moving top-to-bottom for OCR states.
visual_enhancers.glass_morphism: Use backdrop-blur-md for sticky headers and floating action buttons.

icons.usage: Use Emerald-600 for active icons, Stone-400 for inactive.

login_bg.usage: Full screen background for auth pages with overlay bg-stone-900/40

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALLATION: Run 'npm install recharts framer-motion' immediately.
2. THEME SETUP: Update tailwind.config.js with the Emerald/Stone palette defined in 'colors'.
3. FONTS: Import Manrope, Public Sans, and JetBrains Mono from Google Fonts in index.css.
4. LAYOUT: Use the 'Bento Grid' strategy for the Dashboard. Do not make it a boring list.
5. BILL UPLOAD: Create a 'Drag & Drop' zone that looks like a physical receipt slot. Use dashed borders and texture.
6. PRICE COMPARISON: Use a 'Battle Card' UI. Your Item (Left) vs. Cheaper Option (Right). Highlight savings in Green.
7. CHARTS: Use Recharts for 'Monthly Spending' (Area Chart) and 'Category Breakdown' (Donut Chart). Style them with the Emerald palette.
8. GLASSMORPHISM: Apply 'backdrop-blur-xl' to the Sidebar and Top Navigation.
9. DATA-TESTID: Add 'data-testid' to all buttons, inputs, and major cards.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': Do not use generic gradients. Use distinct, solid colors or subtle noise textures.
Spacing: Use p-8 or p-10 where you'd normally use p-4. Let the data breathe.
Micro-Interactions: Buttons should scale down slightly on click. Inputs should glow on focus.
Dark Mode: Ensure the 'Stone' palette inverts correctly to 'Dark Stone' (Zinc/Neutral) for dark mode.
